title: Cupcakes and Murder
description: *This is book 5 in the Frosted Love Cozy Mystery Series*   Detective Beckett and Missy didn't bank on becoming murder suspects only a few days after arriving in sunny Cozumel. Pitted against the wild accusations of the locals, the two foreigners must discover the true motive for the crime and track down the real killer before time runs out for them both!  Copy and paste these links into your browser to get the rest of the books in the series: Book 1: http://amzn.to/1zyu5vx Book 2: http://amzn.to/1F4EZvi Book 3: http://amzn.to/1Eq21qR Book 4: http://amzn.to/1L0JO7m   Click the “buy now with 1 click” button at the top of the page OR Read it for FREE with Kindle Unlimited.
author: Carol Durand
